variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Alberta 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 8% on the portion of income up to $60,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 10% on the portion of income over $60,000 up to $151,234. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 12% on the portion of income over $151,234 up to $181,481. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 13% on the portion of income over $181,481 up to $241,974. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 14% on the portion of income over $241,974 up to $362,961. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 15% on the portion of income above $362,961. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_6 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all six brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
